entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
